titles.title: Restoring Fulbright Exchanges with China and Hong Kong Act
Restoring Fulbright Exchanges with China and Hong Kong Act

To nullify the termination of the Fulbright exchange program with regard to China and Hong Kong with respect to future exchanges for participants traveling both from and to China or Hong Kong, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Restoring Fulbright Exchanges with China and Hong Kong Act
This bill nullifies the portion of Executive Order 13936 that terminated the Fulbright exchange program with respect to exchanges with China and Hong Kong.
